QuestData.Title: The Amulet of Allistarj
QuestData.Description: To summon our demon, we need three amulets, and the first is the Amulet of Allistarj.$b$bAllistarj himself is dead, but he locked his amulet up in a trove inside this very cave. Along with the other amulets, this relic will give us access to Razelikh's perch.$b$b<Kasim concentrates for a moment.>$b$bThe amulet is close to the entrance. I recommend using the teleporter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Amulet of Allistarj from the Serpent's Coil in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Allistarj left a piece of himself in that amulet. Even now, I can sense his evil.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kasim examines the amulet.>$b$bHe was an archmage, I can feel it. I will hold the amulet for you while you collect the rest.
